articles.title: Virat Kohli rejoins Team India in South Africa for 1st Test after spending time with Anushka Sharma in London - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: Virat Kohli has rejoined the Indian squad ahead of the Boxing Day Test against South Africa, starting in Centurion on December 26.
articles.content: Virat Kohli has rejoined the Indian squad ahead of the Boxing Day Test against South Africa, starting in Centurion on December 26. The 35-year-old left for London to be with his wife Anushka Sharma, … [+1052 chars]
